channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping , again and again, 30th September
item.description:
I’ve lost count on how many times this spot has accumulated sacks of trash that never gets collected. PLEASE get to the bottom of this. The same person has been dumping trash here over and over and over again, it’s not only unhygienic, it really STINKS

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adolphus Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping down alley on Wells Way, 30th September
item.description:
My neighbour and I have a problem with flytipping down an alley that separates our homes. It is to the north of 123 Wells Way and immediately adjacent to our home behind a door that can be easily accessed. The general rubbish has been piling up and now impedes my neighbour’s access to his garden and has contributed to damp problems in our home.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wells Way, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping - overflowing bin, 30th September
item.description:
Once again our bins have overflowed and people aren’t putting things in the bins. Needs clearing and another big bin supplying please. Thanks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street weeding for months, 30th September
item.description:
We haven’t had anyone weed the top of Auckland Hill for some months now. I’ve noticed people do come to the street, but they work at the bottom of the hill and don’t seem to come past door number 21 on the right-hand side as you walk up the street. It’s getting particularly bad outside number 5. I’ve been out a couple of times to weed from number 19 to 11 but I have a full time job and two kids so it’s hard to make time to do this regularly. Plus I believe this is supposed to be done by the council every six weeks. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Auckland Hill, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping plus a carcass of a dead fox, 30th September
item.description:
Illegal fly tipping between numbers 1 and 3 Lee Church Street including a carcass of a dead fox potentially attracting rodents and creating a biological hazard. This has bees first spotted beginning of September.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3-13, Lee Church Street, Blackheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sewage from blocked drain, 30th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Blanmerle Road, New Eltham, London

item.title: Loud loose manhole cover, 30th September
item.description:
The manhole cover in front of 2 Thwaites cottage, Cray Road has been loose since the road resurfacing making loud noise each time vehicle drives over. This has caused significant disturbance to residence and road users. Can this be repaired before it becomes serious safety hazard please? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Cray Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
